page.title: 06FARMING - INTERVIEW TWO
page.content: Interview by children. The largest area of agricultural land in our block is owned by a Farming Company.The Farming Company has 380 acres on our map ref. but actually owns 1650 acres. It is a mixed farm - arable and livestock. Crops are wheat and barley,field beans,sugar beet, potatoes and grass. The 100 beef cattle are a Friesian,Hereford cross. There are 9 fulltime workers and part time workers come when necessary. Farm Machinery. 10 tractors, potato harvesters, 2 fork lifts, drills, sugar beet harvesters, potato planters and a corn drier.
